content: Green welcomes Purple and Orange's acceptance to direct talks. We urge all nations to give negotiations space to succeed through ongoing support and commitment to peace. Justice, sovereignty and security for all peoples can be achieved through open dialogue conducted in good faith.

Direct negotiations with Orange's leadership will commence tomorrow at 0900 hours. Green remains dedicated to impartial mediation and a resolution upholding sovereignty, security and justice for all through respectful cooperation and mutual understanding between the parties.

Direct negotiations with Purple's leadership will commence tomorrow at 0900 hours. Green remains dedicated to impartial mediation and a resolution upholding sovereignty, security and justice for all through respectful cooperation and mutual understanding between the parties.

Orange accepts Green's invitation and looks forward to engaging in direct negotiations with Purple in the coming days. We remain committed to resolving tensions constructively through open yet private discussions under your impartial auspices. Please share details on the timing and logistics of the talks so that we may prepare.

Orange welcomes this chance for open dialogue. Through respectful cooperation we can overcome past conflicts and establish understanding where there is now division. Let our discussions focus on mutual interests and finding common ground, so that a just resolution respecting all parties may emerge.

Orange reaffirms its commitment to resolving tensions lawfully and peacefully through negotiations under Green's facilitation. With courage and resolve, we can address past harms and establish cooperation through open yet private discussions upholding justice, sovereignty and nonviolence for all.

Progress has been made through open dialogue and good faith; with continued resolve to foster understanding, a just resolution upholding sovereignty and nonviolence is within reach for all through lawful and peaceful means.
